title: Bug 14197: Changes made immediately when removing a working set
description: When removing a working set, the changes are made immediately.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered. 2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. 3. Delete the first working set.
